lenders.name: Naomi
lenders.loan_because: I want to buy more stocks of my food supplements to be distributed by my co distributors in the area as well as to my  retail patients.
lenders.occupational_info: i have been the accredited stock center of TIENS health food supplement in Iligan City since 2002.  i have served my distributor downlines from this city all throughout  Lanao del Norte, Lanao del Sur and other neighboring provinces. As TIENS in my area is getting additional popularity through the testimonies of the recovered patients by using these products, additional distributors are coming in  and I am having a shortage of my products due to a little capital only.  This business has been my bread and butter for my 3 daughters and one grandson, despite that I am a single-parent with no financial support from the father of my children.

English: I believe that micro-lending dramatically improves the lives of people. It's an easy way to help people around the world to build their own business. I enjoy being able to help people help themselves in a small way.

German: Ich glaube das Mikrokredite eine einfache Möglichkeit sind, um Menschen den Weg zur Selbsthilfe zu ermöglichen. Wenn es durch einen kleinen Beitrag möglich ist, Selbständigen und Unternehmern dabei zu helfen ihr Geschäft aufzubauen, will ich mich gerne beteiligen.

We work hard to achieve our goals as a team. As stated above, I believe everyone deserves a chance and I'll add by working hard and never giving up no matter what !

EcoJoia | Organic Clothing for Causes
Our mission at EcoJoia is to support the merchandise needs of environmental and humanitarian non-profit organizations, with the goal of increasing their fund raising capabilities and simultaneously spreading cause awareness. We also believe in selling products made from environmentally conscious materials such as certified organic cotton and earth-friendly dyes and screen printing, wherever possible.

Hi

I need a loan which would help me get back to the USA. I am a citizen of USA..by birth.

I have been stranded in Nigeria for over 20 yrs. I just recently got a new US passport reissued last year.

I really need a loan to help me get a 2-way ticket back to the states so as to apply for my SSN- social security number.

I hope to pay the loan back after I get a new credit card with the use of my SSN.

lenders.name: rama
lenders.occupational_info:
Travel guide / personal assistance to foriegners who visits India and saibaba. 

Location: Andhra Pradesh » puttaparthi > Sri Sathya Sai baba place  

Hello my friend
This is Krishna from India, living in puttaparthi (Andhra Pradesh) which is in the southern part of India, about 150 km. northwest of Bangalore. Puttaparthi ( Put- apart-the I ) is the birthplace of “SRI SATHYA SAI BABA”  an Avatar who is recognized and worshiped by about 50 million people on this planet, 
Visitors are streaming in all year round from all nations and religions. Being born here, and devoted to Sai Baba, I know all the local points of interest. I am professional Tourist guide and I do organize accommodation and assist for they needs from arrival to departure, as a tour guide, I cover all the sight seeing places in South and north India, 
If you interesting to visits India, you can contact me for travel guide personal assistance
I come to pickup you in the airport, and I can organize for you accommodation, sightseeing, and arranging tours, a personal assistant.
I can give my best services. 

Regards 
Krishna 

Contact: Mr. Krishna CH 
Mobile: +919490540659 
touristorganizer@gmail.com
Chitravathi road puttaparthi pin 515134 Andhra Pradesh, India

lenders.occupational_info: I manage the specification and development of specialized computer systems, especially geographical information systems and document management systems, in the company I work for.

lenders.name: Joseph

lenders.name: Martti Munne
lenders.loan_because: I wan't to help people to help themselves. I believe that giving money for free just makes people passive. Loaning money to motivated and hard working people who want to develope their own family, business and society, is more rewarding for them as well as it is for me.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm working in a back-office on financial industry.

lenders.occupational_info: I research the effects of earthquakes on bridges, buildings, and other infrastructure in the attempt to reduce the loss of life and property to those affected by these natural disasters.
